verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.2: “Bang tanvei thu genin hong gimsak ding na hi hiam?
verses.3: Kei nong simmawh niloh a, tua banga na gamtatna ah maizumna mel na nei thei kei hi.
verses.4: A khial takpi hi taleng zong nangʼ lainatna ding bang om ahi hiam?
verses.5: Keimah sangin a hoih zaw-in nang na kingaihsun a, ka thuak gimnate pen keima mawhna hangin na ngaihsun hi.
verses.6: Hih thu hong piangsak pa Pasian ahih lam mu thei lo na hi hiam? Kei hong mat nadingin amah in thang hong siah hi.
verses.7: Keimah hong ngongbawlna ka nialnial hangin kuamah in hong don kei hi. Thuman ka deih hangin hong kipia kei hi.
verses.8: Pasian in ka lampi khaktan a, ka paisuak zo kei hi. Amah in ka pai nading lampi khua mialcipsak hi.
verses.9: Amah in ka hauhna khempeuh hong lakkhiatsak a, ka min hoih kimlai hong siasak hi.
verses.10: Amah in ka pumpi khempeuh hong sat gawp hi. Ka nopsakna teng hong zunglot sakin, vul gawpin a si dingin kei a hong nusia hi.
verses.11: Keima tungah Pasianʼ hehna hong so gawp a, ama gal lian penin kei a hong ngaihsun hi.
verses.12: Amah in keimah a sim dingin a galkapte hong sawl a, a galkapte in dum to-in ka buk hong umcih uh hi.
verses.13: “Pasian in ka sanggamte hong taisansak a, kei hong thei sate kiangah khualmi ka suak hi.
verses.14: Ka behte le ka lawmte bei mang khinta uh hi.
verses.15: Ka inn ah a hong tung ngei keima zinte in hong mangngilh ta a, ka na a sem numeite in khualmi bangin hong bawl uh a, amauteʼ mai ah midangpi khat ka suak hi.
verses.16: Ka nasemte khatpeuh ka sap ciangin hong dawng nuam lo uh a, hong huh nading uh ka thum ciang nangawnin hong thudon lo uh hi.
verses.17: Ka zi nangawn in ka gimnam thuak zo lo a, ka sanggamte mahmah in zong hong naih nuam lo uh hi.
verses.18: Naupang melmawl nangawn in kei hong simmawh uh a, kei hong muh uh ciangin hong nuihsan uh hi.
verses.19: Ka lawm it pente nangawn in kei hong muhdah et uh a, ka it pente nangawn in kei hong langbawl uh hi.
verses.20: Ka guh tungah ka vun kol dihdiahin om a, a nungta liailiai bekin kei a om ka hi hi.
verses.21: Hong hehpih un! Hong hehpih un! Keima lawmte hi lo na hi uh hiam? Pasian in kei hong sat pai ta hi.
verses.22: Pasianʼ hong bawlsiat bangin bang hangin no zong kei hong bawlsia ding na hi uh hiam? Nong gimsakna uh kicing ta hoh hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.23: “Ka thugente khempeuh mi khatpeuh in ciamteh henla, laibu khat sungah a khum hileh ut mahmah ing!
verses.24: Tua ahih kei leh zong, ka thugente khempeuh sikkhu khat tawh suang tungah kikhen henla, a mang ngei nawn lo dingin a kigelh hileh ut ing!
verses.25: “Ahi zongin a tawpna ah kei hong panpih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi.
verses.26: Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi.
verses.27: Keima mit teekteek tawh amah ka mu dinga, amah in kei hong khualmi et lo ding hi. “Ka lungsim hanna a bei hi.
verses.28: Bang hang hiam cih leh, ‘Amah bangci gimsak thei ding ihi hiam?’ na ci uh hi. Kei nong suktheih nadingun paulap khatpeuh na zong uh hi.
verses.29: Ahi zongin tu-in namsau kihta un. Tua namsau in a mawhte tungah Pasianʼ hehna hong sem ding hi. Tua ciangin thukhen ding khat a om lam na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
